SELECT STTN_ID AS NODE_ID, STTN_NM AS NODE_NM, STTN_ID, STTN_NM, STTN_NO , AREA , DL5.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM , WAY_DIV , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS WAY_DIV_NM , GPS_X, GPS_Y, CENTER_YN , STTN_FCLT_TYPE , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS STTN_FCLT_TYPE_NM , VHC_DOOR_DIR_TYPE , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_DOOR_DIR_TYPE_NM , BAY_TYPE , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS BAY_TYPE_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON A.STTN_FCLT_TYPE = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'STTN_FCLT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON A.VHC_DOOR_DIR_TYPE = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'VHC_DOOR_DIR_TYPE' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON A.WAY_DIV = DL3.DL_CD AND DL3.CO_CD = 'WAY_DIV' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL4 ON A.BAY_TYPE = DL4.DL_CD AND DL4.CO_CD = 'BAY_TYPE' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL5 ON A.AREA = DL5.DL_CD AND DL5.CO_CD = 'AREA' WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN!='Y'
